statements: SELECT * FROM rewards_points;
SELECT transaction_id, cardholder_name, points_earned FROM rewards_points WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT cardholder_name, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM rewards_points GROUP BY cardholder_name;
SELECT * FROM rewards_points ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, points_earned FROM rewards_points WHERE points_earned > 50 ORDER BY points_earned DESC, cardholder_name;
SELECT * FROM rewards_points WHERE points_earned > 100 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM rewards_points GROUP BY cardholder_name HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT transaction_id, cardholder_name, purchase_amount, points_earned FROM rewards_points WHERE points_earned < 50 ORDER BY points_earned ASC, transaction_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_purchase_amount, COUNT(DISTINCT cardholder_name) AS active_customers FROM rewards_points WHERE points_earned > 0;
SELECT * FROM rewards_points WHERE points_earned BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND cardholder_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM rewards_points;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM rewards_points ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT reward_id, customer_id, earn_date FROM rewards_points WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM rewards_points WHERE earn_date >= '2022-01-01' AND earn_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM rewards_points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase > 500;
SELECT * FROM rewards_points WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT reward_id, customer_id, earn_date FROM rewards_points WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY earn_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM rewards_points GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase > 500;
SELECT rp.reward_id, rh.transaction_date FROM rewards_points rp JOIN reward_history rh ON rp.reward_id = rh.reward_id WHERE rh.customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(reward_id) AS total_rewards FROM reward_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_rewards > 3 ORDER BY total_rewards DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, purchase_amount, points_earned FROM rewards_points WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE card_type = 'Visa' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM rewards_points GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (12345, 54321);
SELECT customer_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM rewards_points GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN rewards_points ON customers.customer_id = rewards_points.customer_id
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(card_number) AS total_cards FROM credit_cards GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_cards DESC
SELECT * FROM rewards_points;
SELECT user_id, points_earned, transaction_date FROM rewards_points ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, card_number FROM cards WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT points_earned, transaction_date FROM rewards_points WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number, expiration_date FROM cards WHERE card_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM rewards_points WHERE transaction_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM rewards_members;
SELECT member_name, rewards_points FROM rewards_members ORDER BY rewards_points DESC;
SELECT member_name, rewards_points FROM rewards_members WHERE rewards_points > 1000;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit >= 5000;
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE card_number = 123456789;
SELECT * FROM rewards_members WHERE rewards_points > 1000 ORDER BY member_id;
SELECT member_name, rewards_points FROM rewards_members JOIN redeemed_rewards ON rewards_members.member_id = redeemed_rewards.member_id WHERE redeemed_rewards.redemption_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE card_number = 1234567890 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, required_points FROM rewards_catalog WHERE required_points BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY card_holder ASC;
